title: Monzo Bank
description: Instant spending updates. Smart budgeting. Great rates abroad. Emoji üôå We‚Äôre a bank, but we‚Äôre trying not to think like one. Open an account with us in minutes, and start getting to know your money better. We‚Äôve been busy for the last few years building the best current account in the world. Now more than 1,000,000 people use Monzo to manage their money and spend around the world. Download the app today to join them. Manage your money - Set spending budgets Set monthly budgets for spending on things like groceries and going out. - See an easy summary See an overview of your account any time, with notifications if you‚Äôre spending too fast. - Get instant notifications Get a notification the moment you use your card, before the receipt finishes printing. Travel easily - Use your card anywhere Monzo works all around the world, and you don‚Äôt need to tell us if you‚Äôre going away. - Take out cash Withdraw up to ¬£200 every 30 days for free (there‚Äôs a 3% charge after that). - Spend for free We don‚Äôt add any fees or charges for spending with your card, and we don‚Äôt mark up the exchange rate. Send money fast - Pay people in seconds Send bank transfers that arrive pretty much instantly. - Set up Direct Debits and standing orders Manage recurring payments from your app. - Split the bill Split through the app and we‚Äôll do the maths for you. Keep your money safe - Stay in control If you lose your card, freeze it in the app and get a new one quickly. (Or defrost it if you find it again.) - Rest easy We‚Äôre part of the FSCS, so your money is protected up to ¬£85,000. And more! - 24/7 real-live human customer support - Fair and transparent overdrafts - Full Google Pay support What people are saying about Monzo: ‚ÄúMonzo? It might just be the future of banking.‚Äù ‚Äî The Guardian ‚ÄúA bank for people who hate banks.‚Äù ‚Äî Bloomberg ‚ÄúMonzo is a bank designed for the world we live in today.‚Äù ‚Äî TechCrunch
descriptionHTML:
Instant spending updates. Smart budgeting. Great rates abroad. Emoji üôå

We‚Äôre a bank, but we‚Äôre trying not to think like one. Open an account with us in minutes, and start getting to know your money better.

We‚Äôve been busy for the last few years building the best current account in the world. Now more than 1,000,000 people use Monzo to manage their money and spend around the world. Download the app today to join them.

Manage your money

- Set spending budgets
Set monthly budgets for spending on things like groceries and going out.
- See an easy summary
See an overview of your account any time, with notifications if you‚Äôre spending too fast.
- Get instant notifications
Get a notification the moment you use your card, before the receipt finishes printing.

Travel easily

- Use your card anywhere
Monzo works all around the world, and you don‚Äôt need to tell us if you‚Äôre going away.
- Take out cash
Withdraw up to ¬£200 every 30 days for free (there‚Äôs a 3% charge after that).
- Spend for free
We don‚Äôt add any fees or charges for spending with your card, and we don‚Äôt mark up the exchange rate.

Send money fast

- Pay people in seconds
Send bank transfers that arrive pretty much instantly.
- Set up Direct Debits and standing orders
Manage recurring payments from your app.
- Split the bill
Split through the app and we‚Äôll do the maths for you.

Keep your money safe

- Stay in control
If you lose your card, freeze it in the app and get a new one quickly. (Or defrost it if you find it again.)
- Rest easy
We‚Äôre part of the FSCS, so your money is protected up to ¬£85,000.

And more!
- 24/7 real-live human customer support
- Fair and transparent overdrafts
- Full Google Pay support

What people are saying about Monzo:
‚ÄúMonzo? It might just be the future of banking.‚Äù ‚Äî The Guardian
‚ÄúA bank for people who hate banks.‚Äù ‚Äî Bloomberg
‚ÄúMonzo is a bank designed for the world we live in today.‚Äù ‚Äî TechCrunch
summary: Monzo makes money work for everyone.
summaryHTML: Monzo makes money work for everyone.

title: Revolut
description:
This is one app to manage all things money. Open an account in minutes to spend, budget, save, and invest, all in one secure place. 

Master managing your everyday spending
- Spend securely with a card you control, where you can freeze and unfreeze with a tap. We‚Äôll give you a virtual card straight away, so that you can link to Google or Apple Pay and start spending immediately while you wait for your physical card to arrive.
- Our award-winning security system is always keeping an eye on your card details - so shop online with peace of mind. Get an extra layer of protection when you pay online with virtual cards that self-destruct as soon as the purchase is complete.
- Get full visibility and control over your spending when you connect your external bank accounts to Revolut.* 
- Easily track and control your subscriptions, direct debits, and recurring payments in one place. 
- Master your money with smart analytics and budgeting tools to help you stay on track. 
- You‚Äôll unlock exclusive access to personalised discounts and cashback from brands you love so you can save more.
- Also, get access to Revolut Junior to teach your kids money skills for life.

Money borders are a thing of the past
- Instant and free, the way it should be: transfer money to Revolut users in more than 30 countries around the world. 
- Get local bank details in-app to send and receive money to other bank accounts - locally and globally.
- From restaurant tabs to rental cars, easily split and settle bills in-app. Keep track of who's paid and nudge those who haven‚Äôt...Ahem.
- Send payment links to friends who haven't upgraded their financial life to Revolut yet. 

When it comes to growing your money, look no further
- Discover Vaults to help you reach your money goals faster - round up your spare change or set up a regular transfer for something special.
 -Go for gold and invest smarter in seconds with precious metals. 

Act like a local wherever you travel
- Spend abroad and exchange at excellent rates with no hidden fees in more than 30 currencies.
- Get cash from ATMs all over the world without hidden fees - limits vary according to your plan.
- Upgrade to Premium or Metal to get exclusive access to overseas medical insurance and lots of other travel perks!

*Some of our products might not be available in your region yet, but we‚Äôre constantly working to get the full Revolut experience out there. Stay tuned for updates!

title: Bank of Scotland Mobile Banking: secure on the go
description:
New to our app? 
Packed with features to help you make smart everyday banking decisions, our app helps you stay on top your money ‚Äì wherever you are.

With our app you can
‚Ä¢	Log on quickly and securely with your fingerprint
‚Ä¢	Manage your account ‚Äì check balances and pending payments
‚Ä¢	Set up Direct Debits and Standing Orders
‚Ä¢	Pay in cheques
‚Ä¢	Easily transfer money and make payments to UK and international accounts
‚Ä¢	Set up spending alerts
‚Ä¢	Check your PIN or request a new one
‚Ä¢	Easily request a new card, report lost or stolen cards, freeze them and order replacements
‚Ä¢	Quickly find and view transactions and statements
‚Ä¢	Update your contact details


You can find plenty of other information in the app by using our ‚ÄòSearch‚Äô tool, as well as our handy ‚ÄòHelp hub‚Äô.


Getting started
You‚Äôll need
‚Ä¢	The phone number that you‚Äôve registered with us
‚Ä¢	A Bank of Scotland UK personal account
‚Ä¢	An Internet Banking username, password and memorable information

Keeping you safe online
We use the latest online security measures to protect your money, your personal information and your privacy. 

How we‚Äôll contact you
Using our app won‚Äôt affect how we contact you. Our emails will address you by your title and surname, and  include the last four digits of your account number, or the last three digits of your postcode. Any text messages we send you will come from BANKOFSCOT. Be aware of any message that differs from this ‚Äì it could be a scam.



Important information
Your phone‚Äôs signal and functionality may affect your service. Terms and conditions apply.

You must not download, install, use or distribute our Mobile Banking apps in the following countries: North Korea; Syria; Sudan; Iran; Cuba and any other country subject to UK, US or EU technology export prohibitions.

When you use this app we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services.

Everyday Offers is available to Bank of Scotland current account customers (excluding Basic Account holders) aged 18+ with a debit/credit card who bank online. Terms and conditions apply.

Fingerprint Logon requires a compatible mobile running Android 6.0 or higher and may not work on some tablets.

Save the Change¬Æ is a registered trademark of Lloyds Bank plc and is used under licence by Bank of Scotland plc.

Bank of Scotland plc, Registered in Scotland No. SC327000. Registered Office: The Mound, Edinburgh EH1 1YZ. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

title: Barclays
description:
The Barclays app 

HOW TO REGISTER
If you‚Äôre 16 or over and you have a UK-registered mobile number and a Barclays current account or Barclaycard, you can register for the app. You‚Äôll need the 16 digit number off your card, then follow the onscreen instructions. Some customers may be required to verify their identity with PINsentry or at a Barclays cash machine.

If you‚Äôve got an activation code, follow the onscreen steps to register (you won‚Äôt need PINsentry for this).

After you‚Äôre set up, you‚Äôll only need your 5-digit passcode to log in. Then you can set up Android Fingerprint to log in faster in future.

This app doesn‚Äôt work on rooted devices.

THE BENEFITS
‚Ä¢Log in quickly and securely when you set up access through Android Fingerprint 
‚Ä¢Manage your personal and business accounts, and view your Barclays mortgage account, as well as managing your personal Barclaycard accounts 
‚Ä¢See recent transactions and check your balances
‚Ä¢Transfer funds between accounts
‚Ä¢Make payments to people you‚Äôve paid before and people in your payee list
‚Ä¢Upload, sort and store your important documents securely with Barclays Cloud It. Just use your camera to take photos of documents you want to store
‚Ä¢Find your nearest branch or cash machine
‚Ä¢Log into Online Banking more easily using Mobile PINsentry. So we can complete some security checks, it can take up to 4 days for Mobile PINsentry to be activated in the app 
‚Ä¢Call our customer services team direct from the app to speak to an advisor
‚Ä¢Manage your Barclays personal and business accounts with 1 secure log-in
‚Ä¢No need to log in to lots of apps - view your current accounts held with other banks, safely and securely, in your app

Terms and conditions apply. You must be aged 16 or over to use the Barclays app.

FOR BUSINESS ACCOUNTS
You can only use the app if you‚Äôre a sole-signatory Barclays Business current account holder. You can‚Äôt register your Barclaycard business or corporate credit cards.

This app is provided by either Barclays Bank UK PLC or Barclays Bank PLC depending on the entity you may have contracted with for banking services. Please refer to your bank documents (terms and conditions, statements, etc.) to confirm the legal entity that provides banking services to you. 
 
Copyright ¬© Barclays 2021. Barclays is a registered trade mark of Barclays plc, used under licence.

Barclays Bank UK PLC. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority (Financial Services Register No. 759676).
Registered in England. Registered No. 9740322 Registered Office: 1 Churchill Place, London E14 5HP.

Barclays Bank PLC. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority (Financial Services Register No. 122702).
Registered in England. Registered no. 1026167 Registered Office: 1 Churchill Place, London E14 5HP.

title: HSBC UK Mobile Banking
description:
Designed especially for our UK customers, the HSBC UK Mobile Banking app lets you manage your money on the go easily and securely.
‚Ä¢ Log on quickly and securely with your fingerprint
‚Ä¢ See your accounts, transactions, standing orders and Direct Debits at a glance
‚Ä¢ View and download your statements
‚Ä¢ Send money to new payees using their bank details or phone number (Paym)
‚Ä¢ Transfer money between accounts
‚Ä¢ Deposit a cheque
‚Ä¢ Block your card temporarily
 
If you have HSBC accounts outside of the UK, please also download the HSBC Mobile Banking app to manage your global accounts.
HSBC is committed to providing digital applications that are accessible to all its customers. We take this responsibility very seriously; accessibility will continue to be a major consideration as we develop the app, and improvements will be delivered in future updates.

‚Ä¢ Transfer money between accounts
‚Ä¢ Deposit a cheque
‚Ä¢ Block your card temporarily

If you have HSBC accounts outside of the UK, please also download the HSBC Mobile Banking app to manage your global accounts.
HSBC is committed to providing digital applications that are accessible to all its customers. We take this responsibility very seriously; accessibility will continue to be a major consideration as we develop the app, and improvements will be delivered in future updates.

title: Lloyds Bank Mobile Banking: by your side
description:
UPDATE Some customers have reported an issue where the app has stopped working. You can fix this by deleting and reinstalling it. We're still looking into the cause. If you have this problem, please let us know - go to ‚ÄúProvide app feedback‚Äù on the Support tab.

When it‚Äôs hard to find time for those small but important jobs, the Lloyds Bank app is here to help. It‚Äôs easy to use, fast, convenient and more secure than ever, with built-in security technology to keep your banking details safe and private.

And since you‚Äôve usually got your mobile or tablet on you, it‚Äôs the simplest way to do your everyday banking.

- Log on quickly and securely with your fingerprint or a 3-character combination from your memorable information
- Check your account balances and pending payments
- View individual transaction details
-  Transfer money between accounts, and make UK and international payments
- Pay your loan or credit card bill
- Pay in cheques
- Earn as you spend with Everyday Offers
- Apply for loans, savings, cards and more
- Freeze debit card transactions, report lost or stolen cards and order replacements
- Reset your password
- Update the your contact details
- Call us safely from the app ‚Äì we‚Äôll already know it‚Äôs you so can quickly connect you without the usual security checks.

<u>GETTING STARTED</u>
New to this app? Setting it up is quick and easy ‚Äì you just need to register your device. For this you‚Äôll need:
- An up-to-date phone number registered with us
- Lloyds Bank UK personal, Islands personal or sterling international account
- Internet Banking user ID, password and memorable information (you can create these in the app)
- A device that isn‚Äôt rooted.

<u>KEEPING YOU SAFE ONLINE</u>
We use the latest online security measures to protect your money, your personal information and your privacy. As a Lloyds Bank Mobile Banking customer, you automatically benefit from our online and mobile banking guarantee: http://www.lloydsbank.com/security.asp

<u>CONTACTING YOU</u>
We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname and either the last 4 digits of your account number or the last part of your postcode '*** 1AB'. Any text messages we send you will come from LLOYDSBANK.

<u>IMPORTANT INFORMATION</u>
Mobile Banking is available to our UK personal (and some Channel Islands, Isle of Man and WorldWide Service) Internet Banking customers. Services may be affected by phone signal and functionality. Terms and conditions apply.

You must not download, install, use or distribute our Mobile Banking apps in the following countries: North Korea; Syria; Sudan; Iran; Cuba and any other country subject to UK, US or EU technology export prohibitions.

Please note that features that require the use of your device‚Äôs phone capability, such as Call us, won‚Äôt work on tablets.

When you use this app we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services.

Everyday Offers is available to Lloyds Bank UK personal current account customers (excluding Basic Account holders) aged 18+ with a debit/credit card who bank online. Terms and conditions apply.

Fingerprint Logon requires a compatible mobile running Android 6.0 or higher and may not currently work on some tablets.

Save the Change¬Æ is a registered trademark of Lloyds Bank plc.

Lloyds Bank plc (registered in England and Wales (no. 2065), registered office: 25 Gresham Street, London EC2V 7HN). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority under registration number 119278.

title: Santander Mobile Banking
description: Use Fingerprint or your security number to access your Santander accounts quickly and safely, including your mortgage, in one place. Business customer? You‚Äôll need to download our other app, ‚ÄòSantander Mobile Business Banking‚Äô to manage your business accounts. Manage your accounts Use ‚ÄòChat‚Äô to ask your banking questions 24/7, when someone‚Äôs available, we‚Äôll put you in touch with a real person Check pending transactions for your current account and credit card Arrange mortgage overpayments or change to a new deal with us Freeze your Mastercard debit or credit card if you‚Äôve lost it Forgotten your card PIN? See it in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô section of the ‚ÄòMore‚Äô menu Quick, easy payments Make secure, fast payments Pay somebody using just their mobile phone number through Paym Manage your Direct Debits and standing orders Use Fingerprint or your Security Number to authorise online transactions, and consents with third party providers. Your money, your way Sign up to My Money Manager and get insights to help you make the most of your money Switch on Retailer Offers and get cashback at top retailers Change your auto log off settings so you can quickly switch between apps and manage your money with ease Set up ‚ÄòQuick Balance‚Äô on your device‚Äôs home screen, and see your chosen account balance without having to log on to the app Before you start You‚Äôll need to make sure that we know your current UK mobile number, so that we can send you One Time Passcodes. Once that‚Äôs done, it takes just a few minutes to get started with Mobile Banking. Open the app and enter your Online Banking log on details. We‚Äôll send you a One Time Passcode (OTP) by text message. Enter the code into the app and we‚Äôll register your device. We‚Äôll then ask if you want to set up Touch ID or Face ID to log on. And that‚Äôs it, you‚Äôre in. Be sure to allow ‚Äòpush notifications‚Äô to get messages from us straight to your phone‚Äôs homescreen. Remember ‚Ä¶ Never share a One Time Passcode (OTP) with another person. Not even a Santander employee. Never download software or let anyone log on to your computer or devices remotely following or during a cold call. Never enter your Online Banking details after clicking on a link in an email or text message. When you install Santander Mobile Banking, you may be asked to let it access information or use your device‚Äôs features. This is so that some of the app‚Äôs features can run properly (almost all Android apps do this). Android own the names of permissions and Santander will only use them to enhance your experience when using the app. You can find a list of the app‚Äôs permissions in your phone‚Äôs Applications Manager, or by visiting Google Play and clicking ‚ÄòInstalled‚Äô. All interest and Retailer Offer rates within our Play Store images are for visual purposes only and may not be indicative of our actual rates. (English language only) Santander Mobile Banking will not run on devices that have been rooted. Please make sure you have the latest Android software on your phone so that our app runs smoothly. Your device will need to be running Android version 6.0 (Marshmallow) or above to use this app. If you are unable to update to this version, please log on to Santander Online Banking to access your accounts. Android and Google Play are trademarks of Google Inc. Santander UK plc. Registered Office: 2 Triton Square, Regent's Place, London, NW1 3AN, United Kingdom. Registered Number 2294747. Registered in England and Wales. www.santander.co.uk. Telephone 0800 389 7000. Calls may be recorded or monitored. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority. Our Financial Services Register number is 106054. You can check this on the Financial Services Register by visiting the FCA‚Äôs website www.fca.org.uk/register. Santander and the flame logo are registered trademarks.
descriptionHTML:
Use Fingerprint or your security number to access your Santander accounts quickly and safely, including your mortgage, in one place.

Business customer? You‚Äôll need to download our other app, ‚ÄòSantander Mobile Business Banking‚Äô to manage your business accounts.

Manage your accounts
Use ‚ÄòChat‚Äô to ask your banking questions 24/7, when someone‚Äôs available, we‚Äôll put you in touch with a real person
Check pending transactions for your current account and credit card
Arrange mortgage overpayments or change to a new deal with us
Freeze your Mastercard debit or credit card if you‚Äôve lost it
Forgotten your card PIN? See it in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô section of the ‚ÄòMore‚Äô menu

Quick, easy payments
Make secure, fast payments
Pay somebody using just their mobile phone number through Paym
Manage your Direct Debits and standing orders
Use Fingerprint or your Security Number to authorise online transactions, and consents with third party providers.
Your money, your way
Sign up to My Money Manager and get insights to help you make the most of your money
Switch on Retailer Offers and get cashback at top retailers
Change your auto log off settings so you can quickly switch between apps and manage your money with ease
Set up ‚ÄòQuick Balance‚Äô on your device‚Äôs home screen, and see your chosen account balance without having to log on to the app

Before you start
You‚Äôll need to make sure that we know your current UK mobile number, so that we can send you One Time Passcodes. Once that‚Äôs done, it takes just a few minutes to get started with Mobile Banking.
Open the app and enter your Online Banking log on details.
We‚Äôll send you a One Time Passcode (OTP) by text message.
Enter the code into the app and we‚Äôll register your device.
We‚Äôll then ask if you want to set up Touch ID or Face ID to log on.
And that‚Äôs it, you‚Äôre in. Be sure to allow ‚Äòpush notifications‚Äô to get messages from us straight to your phone‚Äôs homescreen.

Remember ‚Ä¶
Never share a One Time Passcode (OTP) with another person. Not even a Santander employee.
Never download software or let anyone log on to your computer or devices remotely following or during a cold call.
Never enter your Online Banking details after clicking on a link in an email or text message.


When you install Santander Mobile Banking, you may be asked to let it access information or use your device‚Äôs features. This is so that some of the app‚Äôs features can run properly (almost all Android apps do this). Android own the names of permissions and Santander will only use them to enhance your experience when using the app. You can find a list of the app‚Äôs permissions in your phone‚Äôs Applications Manager, or by visiting Google Play and clicking ‚ÄòInstalled‚Äô.

All interest and Retailer Offer rates within our Play Store images are for visual purposes only and may not be indicative of our actual rates.
(English language only)
Santander Mobile Banking will not run on devices that have been rooted. Please make sure you have the latest Android software on your phone so that our app runs smoothly. Your device will need to be running Android version 6.0 (Marshmallow) or above to use this app. If you are unable to update to this version, please log on to Santander Online Banking to access your accounts.

Android and Google Play are trademarks of Google Inc.

Santander UK plc. Registered Office: 2 Triton Square, Regent's Place, London, NW1 3AN, United Kingdom. Registered Number 2294747. Registered in England and Wales. www.santander.co.uk. Telephone 0800 389 7000. Calls may be recorded or monitored. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority. Our Financial Services Register number is 106054. You can check this on the Financial Services Register by visiting the FCA‚Äôs website www.fca.org.uk/register. Santander and the flame logo are registered trademarks.

title: TSB Mobile Banking
description: Say hello to your mobile banking app. See all your accounts in one place Manage your money whenever you want, wherever you are. You can check your balances, pay bills, send money to friends, move money to your savings account and find your nearest branch. Log in effortlessly and securely We give you both convenience and security. Use biometric authentication to log in and authorise payments. Identify payments quickly with merchant logos Logos from your favourite shops now appear in your transactions. It‚Äôs easy to get started To use the app, you'll need to be registered for Internet Banking and have your login details to hand: ‚Ä¢ User ID ‚Ä¢ Password ‚Ä¢ Memorable information What you need to use this app You‚Äôll need to be a personal TSB customer, registered for Internet Banking and have a device running Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or above. You'll need to be a UK resident to apply for new products. Having problems? ‚Ä¢ Have you looked at our mobile app FAQs? ‚Ä¢ If you‚Äôre having trouble logging in, follow our helpful interactive guide ‚Ä¢ Check our service status to see if everything is running as it should be. Important information This app is intended for TSB personal Internet Banking customers. Terms and conditions apply http://www.tsb.co.uk/internet-banking-terms-and-conditions-2016.pdf. TSB Bank plc. Registered office: Henry Duncan House, 120 George Street, Edinburgh EH2 4LH. Registered in Scotland, no SC95237. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority under registration number 191240. TSB Bank plc is covered by the Financial Service Compensation Scheme and the Financial Ombudsman Service.
descriptionHTML:
Say hello to your mobile banking app.

See all your accounts in one place
Manage your money whenever you want, wherever you are. You can check your balances, pay bills, send money to friends, move money to your savings account and find your nearest branch.

Log in effortlessly and securely
We give you both convenience and security. Use biometric authentication to log in and authorise payments.

Identify payments quickly with merchant logos
Logos from your favourite shops now appear in your transactions.

It‚Äôs easy to get started
To use the app, you'll need to be registered for Internet Banking and have your login details to hand:
‚Ä¢ User ID
‚Ä¢ Password
‚Ä¢ Memorable information

What you need to use this app
You‚Äôll need to be a personal TSB customer, registered for Internet Banking and have a device running Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or above. You'll need to be a UK resident to apply for new products.

Having problems?
‚Ä¢ Have you looked at our mobile app FAQs?
‚Ä¢ If you‚Äôre having trouble logging in, follow our helpful interactive guide
‚Ä¢ Check our service status to see if everything is running as it should be.

Important information
This app is intended for TSB personal Internet Banking customers. Terms and conditions apply http://www.tsb.co.uk/internet-banking-terms-and-conditions-2016.pdf.

TSB Bank plc. Registered office: Henry Duncan House, 120 George Street, Edinburgh EH2 4LH. Registered in Scotland, no SC95237.

Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority under registration number 191240.

TSB Bank plc is covered by the Financial Service Compensation Scheme and the Financial Ombudsman Service.

title: Royal Bank of Scotland Mobile Banking
description:
Everyday banking from the comfort of your home. Our app makes your day-to-day banking easy, quick and secure.

It‚Äôs available to customers aged 11+ with compatible Android devices and a UK or international mobile number in specific countries.

New features

‚Ä¢ Your face is your password. Take a selfie and you'll soon be able to make larger payments on mobile.
‚Ä¢ Want to make easy and secure payments on the go? You can now seamlessly add your credit cards to the Google Wallet.

You‚Äôre in control of your money
From being able to quickly check your account balances and transactions, to moving money between accounts, sending money securely to others and paying someone new up to ¬£1000 without a card reader or getting cash from an ATM without your debit card, our app gives you greater control of your finances. 

You can manage your bills easily and check the details of Direct Debits and standing orders. If you need a hand with anything, our Secure Messaging tool lets you to contact us in-app for any extra help.

You‚Äôre protected by our secure banking promise
With our app you‚Äôre covered by our secure banking promise, which makes it one of the safest ways to bank. We monitor your account 24/7 for unusual activity and will refund any money paid out of your account as long as you keep your security information safe.

You can log in to the app safely with your fingerprint, face or secure passcode and there is always a confirmation check to make sure you‚Äôre paying the right person or business.

Find a new account to suit you 
‚Ä¢ Apply directly for a current account from the Royal Bank app (account eligibility criteria apply)
‚Ä¢ Open and manage a savings account (account eligibility criteria apply)
‚Ä¢ Apply for a lending product directly in the app (aged 18+ eligibility criteria apply)

Need help managing your money? Our smart tools are here to help
‚Ä¢ Check your Credit Score
‚Ä¢ Manage your spending and set budgets
‚Ä¢ Lock and unlock your debit and credit cards
‚Ä¢ Set travel plans
‚Ä¢ Manage and store receipts
‚Ä¢ Set savings goals directly in the app
‚Ä¢ Add your loyalty cards directly to your app

Important information for you
‚Ä¢ There is a maximum of 5 payments totalling ¬£1000 per day. You must be aged 16 or over.
‚Ä¢ Get Cash - Withdraw up to ¬£130 every 24 hours at our branded ATMs. You must have at least ¬£10 available in your account and an active debit card (locked or unlocked).
‚Ä¢ Fingerprint and facial recognition are available on selected devices.
‚Ä¢ Credit score available once opted in through the app, to customers aged 18+, with a UK address and is provided by TransUnion.
‚Ä¢ Spending - You must be aged 16+. Only available for Personal and Premier Current accounts.
‚Ä¢ Lock and unlock MasterCard credit cards only
‚Ä¢ You can create one Travel Plan at a time, for a maximum period of 90 days, that includes up to seven countries. Each country needs to be registered separately. The Travel Plan will apply to debit cards only, attached to accounts that are managed via mobile banking, and only in your name. Joint account holders should register separately.
‚Ä¢ Managing your receipts is available to Business Banking and Premier customers only.
‚Ä¢ Savings goal available on instant access savings accounts.
‚Ä¢ My Loyalty Cards is available to customers aged 18+.

Please make sure you accept the following permissions before starting:¬†
‚Ä¢ Allow the app to communicate through your network
‚Ä¢ To find your nearest cash machine or branch, you'll need to let the app find your location
‚Ä¢ To 'Pay Your Contacts', the app will need access to your contacts list
By downloading this application, you are accepting the terms and conditions which can be viewed at rbs.co.uk/mobileterms. We recommend that you save or print a copy of the terms and conditions and privacy policy for your records.

title: Metrobank Mobile Banking
description:
METROBANK MOBILE BANKING

The Metrobank Mobile Banking app gives you what you want in a banking app, plus more!

Designed around how you want to do your banking on-the-go, Metrobank gives you a mobile banking app with an easy-to-navigate and customizable interface, banking services such as balance inquiry, bills payment, and funds transfer capabilities, as well as useful services such as buying and sending load, branch locator and rate checking all on your mobile phone! 

WHY USE METROBANK MOBILE BANKING

-	Full online enrollment: use your Metrobank debit card or credit card to activate your account (no need to go to a branch or ATM)
-	Easy payments: pay bills, buy/send load, request for payment, send out payment, and more!
-	Account customization: upload profile pics for yourself and your friends, assign nicknames to your accounts
-	Send or receive funds using mobile numbers: no need to disclose account numbers when transferring to anyone who is enrolled in Metrobank Mobile Banking. Request for or send out funds with personalized messages as well!
-	What‚Äôs New: read about the latest in financial markets, banking news, and the latest promo deals and offers
-	Forex Update: get updated foreign exchange rates
-	Car and Home Loan Calculator: compute for the monthly installment required for the car or home that you want or request for assistance from a loan specialist
-	Branch Locator: know where our branches are via Google Maps

Security features for your ease and peace of mind:
-	Log-in with a User ID and password.*
-	Receive a one-time password (OTP) and notification messages for certain transactions
-	Get device authorization for every device you use

STANDARD FEATURES

Continue to enjoy basic functionalities such as:
-	View account balance and details
-	Pay bills/transfer funds one time or make scheduled payments/transfers¬†
-	Buy mobile/prepaid load
-	Reorder checkbook

Learn more about the Metrobank Mobile Banking app at www.metrobank.com.ph/metrobankmobile 

The use of the Metrobank Mobile Banking app is subject to an end-user license agreement which you can find at www.metrobank.com.ph  Personal Banking  e-Channels  Metrobank Mobile Banking 

The Metrobank Mobile Banking app is a property of Metropolitan Bank & Trust Company.

METROBANK MOBILE BANKING

The Metrobank Mobile Banking app gives you what you want in a banking app, plus more!

Designed around how you want to do your banking on-the-go, Metrobank gives you a mobile banking app with an easy-to-navigate and customizable interface, banking services such as balance inquiry, bills payment, and funds transfer capabilities, as well as useful services such as buying and sending load, branch locator and rate checking all on your mobile phone!

WHY USE METROBANK MOBILE BANKING

- Full online enrollment: use your Metrobank debit card or credit card to activate your account (no need to go to a branch or ATM)
- Easy payments: pay bills, buy/send load, request for payment, send out payment, and more!
- Account customization: upload profile pics for yourself and your friends, assign nicknames to your accounts
- Send or receive funds using mobile numbers: no need to disclose account numbers when transferring to anyone who is enrolled in Metrobank Mobile Banking. Request for or send out funds with personalized messages as well!
- What‚Äôs New: read about the latest in financial markets, banking news, and the latest promo deals and offers

- Receive a one-time password (OTP) and notification messages for certain transactions
- Get device authorization for every device you use

STANDARD FEATURES

Continue to enjoy basic functionalities such as:
- View account balance and details

title: Halifax Mobile Banking
description: UPDATE Some customers have reported an issue where the app has stopped working. You can fix this by deleting and reinstalling it. We're still looking into the cause. If you have this problem, please let us know - go to ‚ÄúProvide app feedback‚Äù on the Support tab. The Halifax Mobile Banking app can do everything you‚Äôd expect, maybe a little extra. And you can use it whenever and wherever you want. So you can crack on if you‚Äôre on the bus, at work or simply can‚Äôt tear yourself away from the telly. THE BASICS - Sign in quickly and securely with your fingerprints or a 3-character combination from your memorable information - Swipe easily to see balances and statements on your Halifax accounts - View details of individual transactions - Check money coming in and going out - Make transfers and payments - Manage your standing orders and view direct debits - Pay your loan or credit card bill - Pay in cheques - Set up new payees or pay your phone contacts. A FEW EXTRAS - Earn as you spend with Cashback Extras - Apply for loans, savings, cards and more - Call us safely from the app ‚Äì we‚Äôll already know it‚Äôs you so can quickly connect you without the usual security checks. STAY SAFE- Freeze card transactions if you‚Äôve temporarily misplaced your debit card or want to restrict how it‚Äôs used - Report lost or stolen cards - Order replacement cards and PINs - Reset your Online Banking password - Update the contact details we have for you. GETTING STARTED New to this app? No problem. Just register your device and you‚Äôre ready to go. For this you‚Äôll need: - An up-to-date phone number registered with us - Halifax UK personal account - Online Banking username, password and memorable information (you can create these in the app) - A device that isn‚Äôt rooted. KEEPING YOU SAFE ONLINE We do all we can to protect you online. We also have an online banking guarantee: http://www.halifax.co.uk/aboutonline/security/ CONTACTING YOU We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname and either the last 4 digits of your account number or the last part of your postcode '*** 1AB'. Any text messages we send you will come from Halifax . IMPORTANT INFORMATION Mobile Banking is available to our Online Banking customers with a UK personal account. Services may be affected by phone signal and functionality. Terms and conditions apply. You must not download, install, use or distribute our Mobile Banking apps in the following countries: North Korea; Syria; Sudan; Iran; Cuba and any other country subject to UK, US or EU technology export prohibitions. Please note that features that require the use of your device‚Äôs phone capability, such as Call us, won‚Äôt work on tablets. When you use this app we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services. Cashback Extras is available to Halifax bank account customers (excluding Basic Account holders) aged 18+ with a debit/credit card who bank online. Terms and conditions apply. Fingerprint Sign-in requires a compatible mobile running Android 6.0 or higher and may not currently work on some tablets. Save the Change¬Æ is a registered trademark of Lloyds Bank plc and is used under licence by Bank of Scotland plc. Halifax is a division of Bank of Scotland plc. This app and Mobile Banking are operated by Bank of Scotland plc (registered in Scotland (No. SC327000) Registered office: The Mound, Edinburgh, EH1 1YZ). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.
descriptionHTML:
UPDATE Some customers have reported an issue where the app has stopped working. You can fix this by deleting and reinstalling it. We're still looking into the cause. If you have this problem, please let us know - go to ‚ÄúProvide app feedback‚Äù on the Support tab.

The Halifax Mobile Banking app can do everything you‚Äôd expect, maybe a little extra. And you can use it whenever and wherever you want. So you can crack on if you‚Äôre on the bus, at work or simply can‚Äôt tear yourself away from the telly.

THE BASICS
- Sign in quickly and securely with your fingerprints or a 3-character combination from your memorable information
- Swipe easily to see balances and statements on your Halifax accounts
- View details of individual transactions
- Check money coming in and going out
- Make transfers and payments
- Manage your standing orders and view direct debits
- Pay your loan or credit card bill
- Pay in cheques
- Set up new payees or pay your phone contacts.

A FEW EXTRAS
- Earn as you spend with Cashback Extras
- Apply for loans, savings, cards and more
- Call us safely from the app ‚Äì we‚Äôll already know it‚Äôs you so can quickly connect you without the usual security checks.

STAY SAFE- Freeze card transactions if you‚Äôve temporarily misplaced your debit card or want to restrict how it‚Äôs used
- Report lost or stolen cards
- Order replacement cards and PINs
- Reset your Online Banking password
- Update the contact details we have for you.

GETTING STARTED
New to this app? No problem. Just register your device and you‚Äôre ready to go. For this you‚Äôll need:
- An up-to-date phone number registered with us
- Halifax UK personal account
- Online Banking username, password and memorable information (you can create these in the app)
- A device that isn‚Äôt rooted.

KEEPING YOU SAFE ONLINE
We do all we can to protect you online. We also have an online banking guarantee: http://www.halifax.co.uk/aboutonline/security/

CONTACTING YOU
We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname and either the last 4 digits of your account number or the last part of your postcode '*** 1AB'. Any text messages we send you will come from Halifax .

IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Mobile Banking is available to our Online Banking customers with a UK personal account. Services may be affected by phone signal and functionality. Terms and conditions apply.

You must not download, install, use or distribute our Mobile Banking apps in the following countries: North Korea; Syria; Sudan; Iran; Cuba and any other country subject to UK, US or EU technology export prohibitions.
Please note that features that require the use of your device‚Äôs phone capability, such as Call us, won‚Äôt work on tablets.

When you use this app we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services.

Cashback Extras is available to Halifax bank account customers (excluding Basic Account holders) aged 18+ with a debit/credit card who bank online. Terms and conditions apply.

Fingerprint Sign-in requires a compatible mobile running Android 6.0 or higher and may not currently work on some tablets.

Save the Change¬Æ is a registered trademark of Lloyds Bank plc and is used under licence by Bank of Scotland plc.

Halifax is a division of Bank of Scotland plc. This app and Mobile Banking are operated by Bank of Scotland plc (registered in Scotland (No. SC327000) Registered office: The Mound, Edinburgh, EH1 1YZ). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.
